title: Ep82: Gallipoli - Suvla Bay
itunes:title: Ep82: Gallipoli - Suvla Bay
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary continue their exploration of the August Offensive at Gallipoli by discussing the landing and fighting at Suvla. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit...
description:
Pete and Gary continue their exploration of the August Offensive at Gallipoli by discussing the landing and fighting at Suvla.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Pete & Gary's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.
